QuestData.Title: O'mrogg's Warcloth
QuestData.Description: Stormwind wants to see proof of our successes in the war effort.$B$BRather than showing him body bags, I thought we'd present him the warcloth of O'mrogg, Kargath's fiercest warrior. Think you can handle him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Warbringer O'mrogg and bring his warcloth to Advance Scout Chadwick inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you bring me the cloth?
QuestData.RewardText: My superiors will be very pleased to see this. Thank you.
